thought: I need to craft a green_wool. Green wool requires a white wool and a green dye. I do not have any white wool but I do have string which is used to craft it. Therefore, I will first craft a white wool using the string. The first step is to move one string into the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1
